name: ElasticBeanstalkEnvironmentTierPropertyType
description: Describes the environment tier for an AWS::ElasticBeanstalk::Environment resource. For more information, see Environment Tiers in the AWS Elastic Beanstalk Developer Guide.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the environment tier. You can specify WebServer or Worker.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of this environment tier. You can specify Standard for the WebServer tier or SQS/HTTP for the Worker tier.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: The version of this environment tier.
